author: wsjcom
title: Transcript of Trump’s Comments on FBI Raid of Lawyer’s Office, Response to Syria Attack
text:
The following is a White House transcript of President Donald Trump’s comments during a meeting with military leaders at the White House on Monday evening. Mr. Trump began by speaking about the FBI’s raid of the office, home and hotel room of his longtime lawyer, Michael Cohen, and then spoke about the administration’s response to the alleged chemical-weapons attack by the Syrian regime.
So I just heard that they broke into the office of one of my personal attorneys—a good man. And it’s a disgraceful situation. It’s a total...
